item.title: Microsoft Security Copilot Achieves SOC 2 Certification
item.description: We are pleased to announce that Microsoft Security Copilot has successfully achievedSOC 2 certification, a significant milestone that reinforces our commitment to delivering secure, compliant soluti...

item.title: From prevention to recovery: Microsoft Unified’s holistic cybersecurity approach
Looking for a career in Incident Response? Consider the DART Infrastructure Engineer role!
item.description: Are you looking to develop your skills as an Infrastructure Specialist? Microsoft Incident Response covers an introduction to the role and how to start your journey.
